text:
1. Deﬁne Problem.
2. Design Test Harness.
3. Test Models.
4. Finalize Model.
You will notice that the process is diﬀerent from a classical linear work-through of a predictive
modeling problem. This is because it is designed to get a working forecast model fast and then
slow down and see if you can get a better model.
3.3 How to Use This Process
The biggest mistake is skipping steps. For example, the mistake that almost all beginners make
